product_info.title: ZD421-HC 4-INCH DESKTOP PRINTERS
product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZD421-HC 4-INCH DESKTOP PRINTERS
ZD421-HC 4-inch Desktop Printers
Elevate your expectations with Zebra’s advanced healthcare desktop
printers
You need a reliable printer built for healthcare that delivers quality performance, now and for years to come. It needs key features,
and be easy to setup, operate, manage and maintain—onsite or remotely. It needs to be secure to protect patient information,
whether integrated onto your network or not, to prevent downtime and costly cyberattacks. You need it, and Zebra delivers it, for
more than 50 years. We’ve engineered our healthcare printers to match your workflows for hassle-free performance. Building on the
legacy of Zebra’s GK Series and ZD420 healthcare printers, the ZD421 delivers the flexibility and reliability you need, with even more
capabilities and security, to set you up for years of use.
Advance Your Healthcare Workflows
Easy to Clean, Sanitize and Safely Power
Disinfectant-ready plastics, UV-resistant housing and a
sealed-button interface make the ZD421 healthcare printer
easy to clean and sanitize, helping prevent the spread of
infections in hospitals and clinics. And, the power supply is IEC
60601-1 compliant for use in healthcare facilities.
Simple to Use
Intuitive and Powerful Operation
The ZD421 offers new, advanced features that make it stand
apart. It includes a new, more intuitive user interface,
It's Time to Advance
powerful architecture and field-upgradeable wireless kit. It
also has new media guide and media handling designs that
Migrate from G to Z make daily operation even easier.
The ZD421 builds on the legacy of Zebra’s GK Series and ZD420
Series printers, offering you the functions and capabilities of Supports Nearly Every Use Case
its predecessor—and much more. The next-generation ZD421
leverages this heritage to deliver advanced features for a new
Multiple Models to Match Your Needs
era of intelligence and forward flexibility, packaged in a
ready-to-work healthcare model. Available in direct thermal, thermal transfer and ribbon
cartridge models, all specifically for healthcare, the ZD421
healthcare printer meets a wide variety of healthcare-specific
use cases and requirements.
The ZD421 – Easy to operate. Flexible features. Ready for tomorrow.
For more information, please visit www.zebra.com/zd421-healthcare
--- Page 2 ---
Ready for Now and What’s Next Movable Sensor for Comprehensive Media Compatibility
The ZD421’s movable media sensor lets you use virtually any
Get Years of Printing Performance media for greater flexibility across a variety of use cases.
Featuring an innovative architecture, the ZD421 is engineered
Print DNA™ Software Suite, Your Built-In
to power future printing. It’s 30% more powerful than the
ZD420 Series and 700% more than the GK Series. Perform Advantage
more operations simultaneously, maintain security and be
ready for what’s next.
Print Securely and Confidently, Without Hassles
Print DNA suite of software, powered by our Link-OS™
Backwards Compatible with Virtually Any Existing Printer
operating system, will get your printer up and running quickly
Deploy your ZD421 into your existing printer fleet with
and securely. Print consistently, and uninterrupted with a
confidence. Use the same label formats and applications
solution that’s fully integrated and interoperable, and will
you’re using today. It supports both EPL and ZPL printer
enable your printer to evolve with your business needs.
languages, and can emulate languages normally associated
with other printer brands using Zebra’s Print DNA tool, Virtual
Update, Troubleshoot and Monitor – All From a Single
Devices.
Location
With Zebra’s Printer Profile Manager Enterprise, part of Print
Connect it Your Way
DNA, you have the ability to easily manage, secure and
Integrate your ZD421 onto your existing wired and wireless
troubleshoot your networked printers from one remote
networks, or connect it directly to any PC. Every ZD421 comes
location. Manage one printer, a group of specific printers or all
standard with USB and USB Host, and offers optional Ethernet,
printers anywhere in the world.
Serial and dual wireless radio with fast 802.11ac Wi-Fi™ and
Bluetooth™ 4.1. Print from any Windows™, Android™ or iOS™
Unparalleled, Peace-of-Mind Printer Security
device. Get your ZD421 up and running with Zebra’s printer
Shield yourself from cyberattacks with Zebra’s PrintSecure,
setup mobile app using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). Use the
part of Print DNA. Easily configure your printers via secure
included Print Touch tag (NFC) to simply tap to pair and print.
connections, identify vulnerabilities, block unauthorized access
and more.
Advanced Flexibility and Features
Explore Managed Print Services (MPS)
Operate with Ease and See Status At-A-Glance
with Assurance
Take the guesswork out of printer status with the ZD421’s five
LED icons to instantly see what’s needed to keep your printers
up and running, from replenishing media to resolving printer Zebra’s Thermal Printers with Print DNA Make MPS Easy
issues. The advanced three-button user interface replaces the Looking to gain control and visibility of your printer fleets with
typical single-button/single-light interface common in desktop MPS? With the Print DNA software toolset, your Zebra MPS
printers to offer added functionality and control. And, provider can remotely manage and optimize your printers,
color-coded touch points guide you through media-handling track and automate supplies replenishment and ensure
tasks for speedy media changes. security.
Groundbreaking Cartridge for Instant Ribbon Changes Supplies, Service and Support
The ZD421 is the only thermal printer to offer a ribbon
cartridge that takes just a few seconds to load with fool-proof, Zebra Certified Supplies
one-way, first-time and every-time instant loading. The smart
Printing supplies provide a digital voice for assets across your
chip in the ribbon lets you know when the ribbon needs
supply chain. You rely on them to disseminate critical data
replacing.
throughout your organization. If something goes wrong with
your printing supplies, operations are interrupted, productivity
Turn Your ZD421 Into a Portable Printer
suffers and costs rise. That’s why we design, produce and
Easily transport your ZD421 printer on a cart or with Zebra’s rigorously pretest our own line of labels, tags and receipt
optional carrying case¹, using the battery option. Print on the paper to ensure consistent, optimized performance in your
spot to reduce steps and increase productivity. Power through Zebra printer. For industry-leading quality, service and
a full shift with the high-capacity battery. expertise, choose Zebra Certified Supplies.
Backed by Zebra’s Worldwide Service and Support
Access repair support services anywhere around the globe
through Zebra and its trusted network of more than 10,000
partners. Zebra OneCare™ provides enhanced coverage that
exceeds standard warranty.
